DOC.brief_title: The Impact Group Singing Patients With Stroke Their Personal Caregivers
DOC.detailed_description: The study focus impact communal singing patient stroke personal caregiver . Forty post-stroke patient randomly assign two group : first group 20 stroke survivor caregiver ( 40 total participant ) receive 6 month ( approximately 24 session ) music therapy . The second control group 20 stroke survivor caregiver receive standard post-stroke care . All enrol participant assess mood , past music experience music genre preference ( music therapy assessment ) . They complete abridge Beck ( BDI-2-fastscreen ) questionnaire , stoke aphasia quality life scale ; Likert measure distress ; Western Aphasia Battery ( WAB ) ; NIH Stroke Scale ( SS ) ; Figely compassion scale ; drive scene test ( Stern White ) ; Rankin . In additional take saliva sample participant measure hormone level .
